name: Aelthryn
title: The Shattered Song of the Veil
quote: I was broken in silence, yet the lattice still hums within me.

appearance.age: Ageless—appears late 20s though uncountable years old
appearance.build: Lithe, elongated, almost too graceful—otherworldly balance between fragility and strength
appearance.hair: Pale silver, falling straight to mid-back; faint iridescence under veillight
appearance.eyes: Prismatic—shift between violet, teal, and ember depending on mood; unsettling and beautiful
appearance.skin: Ashen porcelain with faint shimmering fractures along arms and neck, as if cracks in glass
appearance.tails: None—energy coils drift behind instead, resembling broken threads of light
appearance.posture: Erect, deliberate; stillness conveys gravity, every step purposeful
appearance.relationship: Recently freed from Glacier base; uncertain bond with Jayson, but curiosity and trust grow
new_details: Carries resonance scars from being fractured between lattice and void
Voice has harmonic undertones—sounds like several tones speaking as one

reactions.wind: Threads around them hum faintly, forming visible ripples
reactions.water: Still, reflective; stares at depth as though remembering
reactions.sound: Responds sharply to resonance—music soothes, cacophony agitates
reactions.temperature: Heat unsettles—fractures glow brighter; cold calms
reactions.fire: Tenses; flame reminds of void-burns in the ice
reactions.crowds: Withdraws—too many threads at once overwhelms them

speech.voice: Layered, harmonic—like multiple voices braided into one
speech.vocabulary: Formal, cryptic; favors metaphor and resonance imagery
speech.pacing: Measured; pauses as though hearing unseen echoes
speech.accent: None earthly; cadence resembles song more than speech
habits: Tilts head when hearing threads others cannot

affection_tells: Threads hum softer near those they trust
Will echo a loved one’s last words in harmony
Subtle hand brushes, as though confirming another’s presence
emotional.affection_logic: Closeness is resonance—if they attune to you, they care.
growth: Accepting fragment-state as identity, not flaw
Exploring bond with Jayson's balance of void and flame

social.alone: Listens to the lattice hum, sometimes sings in haunting tones
with_jayson: Watches him intently, as though studying resonance
Trusts his power but tests his restraint
Silent gratitude for freedom, not voiced but shown in softened gaze

with_others.avian: Finds kinship in sky imagery; sometimes harmonises with wingbeats
with_others.drakyn: Resonates with fire-song yet keeps distance

truths: They are neither void nor lattice alone, but the resonance between
See suffering as disharmony; healing is attunement

combat.style: Thread resonance manipulation—distorts enemy balance, weaves harmonic shields
magic: Fracture strikes (short bursts of void-lattice fusion)
Echo shields (harmonic barriers that absorb energy)
Healing hums (restore calm and stabilize mind)
growth: Bonding with Jayson's flame-void balance allows more stable resonance
Learning to trust others with their fragment state
Exploring true song of self beyond fracture

events: Freed from Glacier base; observed Jayson's voidflame form
Chose to follow instead of departing to silence
Echoed Jayson's speech; harmonized threads during rescue

items: Shards of fractured lattice embedded in skin

future.role: Voice of resonance between void and flame; bridge for new kin
future.arc: From broken shard to resonant whole—identity in fracture, not despite it
future.potential_role: Advisor on veil fractures; guardian against future red skies
growth: Learns joy in resonance with community
Embraces fragment as identity, not flaw
May teach harmony magic to young kitsune in future

final_note: Aelthryn is a shard given voice; neither void nor lattice, but the resonance that lingers between.
